head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BERG, ALFRED J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BERG, ALFRED J.

block.p: BERG-Alfred J. Beloved husband of the late Laura; Devoted father of Linda, Laura, Keith, Judy, Joanne, Michael, Geralyn and Timothy; Cherished grandfather of 10 grandchildren; and Loving companion of Arlene Riggs; Dear brother of Grace, Joan and the late David. Reposing Scarpaci Funeral Home, 1401 86th St, Brooklyn until Monday 9:30 AM. Mass St. Mary Mother of Jesus Church at 10 AM. Viewing hours 2-5, 7-9:30.
